text: Notre-Dame-de-Sanilhac is a former commune. It is in Nouvelle-Aquitaine in the Dordogne department in southwest France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Sanilhac.Arrêté préfectoral 26 September 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Dordogne
title: Notre-Dame-de-Sanilhac
